org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class EconomicBinomialStorageElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SimpleStorageElement
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.AccessHistoryStorageElement
        • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.EconomicBinomialStorageElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageElement, FileWorthStorageElement

    public class EconomicBinomialStorageElement
extends AccessHistoryStorageElement
implements FileWorthStorageElement
    A StorageElement which implements an economic model for file replication. Predictions of future file values are based on a binomial distribution of file indexes.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4
    Author:
    caitrian

      java.util.List filesToDelete(DataFile newFile)

      • evaluateFileWorth

        public double evaluateFileWorth(int fileId)
        Calculate the value of the file corresponding to fileID using the binomial-based economic model.
        Specified by:

      • filesToDelete

        public java.util.List filesToDelete(DataFile newFile)
        Returns the least valuable file on the SE, based on past access history. It does not consider the value of the file which may be replicated.
        Specified by:
        filesToDelete in interface StorageElement
        Overrides:
        filesToDelete in class SimpleStorageElement
        Returns:
        The least valuable DataFile on the SE or null if none are deletable.
